Product - Class in com.packt.webstore.domain
The class Product represents basic information about product, like code, name, price It is an Entity class.

ProductController - Class in com.packt.webstore.controller
The product controller class for the products.jsp and product.jsp files The class supports website with available products and the details of the chosen product
ProductController() - Constructor for class com.packt.webstore.controller.ProductController
 
ProductData - Class in com.packt.webstore.domain
The class ProductData is an Entity class connected with the view PRODUCT_DATA in the database the ProductData reference is used in the repository layer by the method serving for displaying the details of the product with the information recorded in the database

The controller method for loading the image of the product
ProductNotFoundException - Exception in com.packt.webstore.exception
The class responsible for handling exceptions related to referring to non-existent products

ProductRepository - Interface in com.packt.webstore.domain.repository
The interface that declares methods of @Repository layer for serving product
ProductService - Interface in com.packt.webstore.service
The interface that declares methods for handling requests for product
ProductServiceImpl - Class in com.packt.webstore.service.impl
The Class implementing Interface ProductService and methods for handling requests for product
ProductServiceImpl() - Constructor for class com.packt.webstore.service.impl.ProductServiceImpl
 
ProductStock - Class in com.packt.webstore.domain
The class ProductStock is an Entity class connected with the table PRODUCT_STOCK in the database the ProductStock reference is used in the repository layer for retrieving information from the database about the product stock
